attributes.action: introduce water efficiency into the National Curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Water efficiency measures make a real difference to the management of this most vital resource, and teaching these issues encourages children to think about resource usage, sustainability and environmental impacts. Our behaviour will change as water becomes increasingly scarce in the future, and we must prepare the next generation for this through changes in the National Curriculum.
